title: Search
author: Web Experience Toolkit
description: princeedwardisland.ca is the official website of the province of Prince Edward Island. Learn about Prince Edward Island and government services available to residents and business
cleaned_text: Search Go to the [News search](/en/news)to search all news Displaying 1 - 40 of 1131. One individual is less than 10 years old and is a household contact of a previously announced case and has been self-... [About COVID-19 (Coronavirus)](/en/information/health-and-wellness/about-covid-19-coronavirus) 2023-05-02 COVID-19 is an illness caused by a coronavirus. Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses that cause respiratory illnesses. With some coronaviruses there are no symptoms or mild illness, like the common cold, while other coronaviruses can cause severe illness. Some human coronaviruses spread... [21 new cases of COVID-19](/en/news/21-new-cases-of-covid-19) 2021-12-20 Chief Public Health Officer, Dr. Heather Morrison, has announced 21 new cases of COVID-19 in Prince Edward Island. These 21 cases are still under investigation and contact tracing is underway. Anyone identified as a close contact will be contacted directly by public health with instructions on...
